title: British PM Johnson facing crisis as nation reacts to government parties held during COVID lockdowns
content:
1. British PM Johnson facing crisis as nation reacts to government parties held during COVID lockdowns  Fox News
  2. Boris Johnson's Communications Chief Attended 2020 Christmas Party, BBC Says  Bloomberg
  3. Boris Johnson's press chief gave out joke awards at Christmas party breaking UK lockdown, reports say  CNN
  4. Will the furore over the No 10 party be enough to burst Boris Johnson’s bubble?  The Guardian
  5. Allegra Stratton did the right thing by quitting – now is the PM’s job on the line too?  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
British PM Johnson facing crisis as nation reacts to government parties held during COVID lockdowns  Fox News

localize.title: ジョンソン英首相、COVIDロックダウン中に開催された政府系パーティへの国民の反発で危機に直面
英国首相约翰逊面临危机，国民对COVID封锁期间举行的政府聚会作出反应
英國首相約翰遜面臨危機，國民對COVID封鎖期間舉行的政府聚會作出反應
